page.title: 16A College Student
page.content: I attend{West Cumbria College}which is situated in Workington. The course I am studying at this college is the BTEC Business and Management National Diploma, I am{studying}on a full time basis. The subjects studied on this course are as follows: Organisation in its Environment, Numeracy and Accounts, Administration in Business, Typewriting, Marketing and Business law. These key subjects are studied every day except for a Wednesday afternoon when{recreational options}take place. These include a number of things such as skiing, sewing, art, etc. When I leave college I have a number of opportunities for{employment}with solicitors, accountants and in clerical work.
